document.full_text: brigham young's jimmer fredette leads the nation in scoring at 28.5 points a game, and one reason for his success was that he honed his skills by playing against prisoners during summers.
document.title: southeast: game face hardened by toil in prison yard
lines_and_colors: brigham young's jimmer fredette leads the nation in scoring at 28.5 points a game, and one reason for his success was that he honed his skills by playing against prisoners during summers.
